clickslidertips: Click slider numbers to input manually.
Only select models support context sizes: Only select models support context sizes greater than 4096 tokens. Increase only if you know what you're doing.
WI Entry Status:\ud83d\udd35 Constant\ud: WI Entry Status:🔵 Constant🟢 Normal❌ Disabled
Temperature controls the randomness in t: Temperature controls the randomness in token selection
Top K sets a maximum amount of top token: Top K sets a maximum amount of top tokens that can be chosen from
Typical P Sampling prioritizes tokens ba: Typical P Sampling prioritizes tokens based on their deviation from the average entropy of the set
Min P sets a base minimum probability: Min P sets a base minimum probability
Top A sets a threshold for token selecti: Top A sets a threshold for token selection based on the square of the highest token probability
Epsilon cutoff sets a probability floor: Epsilon cutoff sets a probability floor below which tokens are excluded from being sampled
Scale Temperature dynamically per token,: Scale Temperature dynamically per token, based on the variation of probabilities
Strength of the Contrastive Search regul: Strength of the Contrastive Search regularization term. Set to 0 to disable CS
Classifier Free Guidance. More helpful t: Classifier Free Guidance. More helpful tip coming soon

We cannot provide support for problems e: We cannot provide support for problems encountered while using an unofficial OpenAI proxy
Enable this if the streaming doesn't wor: Enable this if the streaming doesn't work with your proxy
Display bot response text chunks as they: Display bot response text chunks as they are generated
Add the bos_token to the beginning of pr: Add the bos_token to the beginning of prompts. Disabling this can make the replies more creative
Ban the eos_token. This forces the model: Ban the eos_token. This forces the model to never end the generation prematurely
Mirostat is a thermostat for output perp: Mirostat is a thermostat for output perplexity

Tell the AI that NSFW is allowed.
NSFW prompt text goes first in the promp: NSFW prompt text goes first in the prompt to emphasize its effect.
Set all samplers to their neutral/disabl: Set all samplers to their neutral/disabled state.

Use OAI knowledge base to enhance defini: Use OAI knowledge base to enhance definitions for public figures and known fictional characters

Always show the full list of the Message: Always show the full list of the Message Actions context items for chat messages, instead of hiding them behind '...'
Alternative UI for numeric sampling para: Alternative UI for numeric sampling parameters with fewer steps
Entirely unrestrict all numeric sampling: Entirely unrestrict all numeric sampling parameters
Time the AI's message generation, and sh: Time the AI's message generation, and show the duration in the chat log

Reduce the formatting requirements on AP: Reduce the formatting requirements on API URLs
Ask to import the World Info/Lorebook fo: Ask to import the World Info/Lorebook for every new character with embedded lorebook. If unchecked, a brief message will be shown instead
Restore unsaved user input on page refre: Restore unsaved user input on page refresh
Allow repositioning certain UI elements: Allow repositioning certain UI elements by dragging them. PC only, no effect on mobile
Save movingUI changes to a new file: Save movingUI changes to a new file
Apply a custom CSS style to all of the S: Apply a custom CSS style to all of the ST GUI
Use fuzzy matching, and search character: Use fuzzy matching, and search characters in the list by all data fields, not just by a name substring
If checked and the character card contai: If checked and the character card contains a prompt override (System Prompt), use that instead
If checked and the character card contains a jailbreak override (Post History Instruction), use that instead
Avoid cropping and resizing imported cha: Avoid cropping and resizing imported character images. When off, crop/resize to 400x600
Show actual file names on the disk, in t: Show actual file names on the disk, in the characters list display only
Prompt to import embedded card tags on c: Prompt to import embedded card tags on character import. Otherwise embedded tags are ignored
Hide character definitions from the edit: Hide character definitions from the editor panel behind a spoiler button
Show a button in the input area to ask t: Show a button in the input area to ask the AI to continue (extend) its last message
Show arrow buttons on the last in-chat m: Show arrow buttons on the last in-chat message to generate alternative AI responses. Both PC and mobile
Allow using swiping gestures on the last: Allow using swiping gestures on the last in-chat message to trigger swipe generation. Mobile only, no effect on PC
Save edits to messages without confirmat: Save edits to messages without confirmation as you type
Render LaTeX and AsciiMath equation nota: Render LaTeX and AsciiMath equation notation in chat messages. Powered by KaTeX
Disalow embedded media from other domain: Disalow embedded media from other domains in chat messages
Skip encoding and characters in messag: Skip encoding  and  characters in message text, allowing a subset of HTML markup as well as Markdown
Allow AI messages in groups to contain l: Allow AI messages in groups to contain lines spoken by other group members

Automatically reject and re-generate AI: Automatically reject and re-generate AI message based on configurable criteria

Display the response bit by bit as it is: Display the response bit by bit as it is generated.
When this is off, responses will be disp: When this is off, responses will be displayed all at once when they are complete.
Send names in the message objects. Helps: Send names in the message objects. Helps the model to associate messages with characters.
Continue sends the last message as assis: Continue sends the last message as assistant role instead of system message with instruction.
Combines consecutive system messages int: Combines consecutive system messages into one (excluding example dialogues). May improve coherence for some models.
Send the system prompt for supported mod: Send the system prompt for supported models. If disabled, the user message is added to the beginning of the prompt.
Eta cutoff is the main parameter of the: Eta cutoff is the main parameter of the special Eta Sampling technique.In units of 1e-4; a reasonable value is 3.Set to 0 to disable.See the paper Truncation Sampling as Language Model Desmoothing by Hewitt et al. (2022) for details.

Use the appropriate tokenizer for Google: Use the appropriate tokenizer for Google models via their API. Slower prompt processing, but offers much more accurate token counting.
